body.p: The Board received a request to clarify the accounting for a change in a disposal plan from a plan to sell to a plan to distribute a dividend in kind to its shareholders. Paragraph 26 of IFRS 5 was interpreted by some, but not all, as requiring this change to be considered as a change to a plan of sale that would be accounted for in accordance with paragraphs 27–29 of IFRS 5
